thread.title: KRISTIN
thread.title_full: Nebraska Furniture Mart reviewed by KRISTIN

author: KRISTIN
title: KRISTIN
text: I was doing this on a mobile android, but when I went to submit my order it kept telling me I had incorrect or missing data and it was to be highlighted. I could not find any missing data, so I decided to use my laptop. The error I was having was in relation to the financing of the 6.99 prong I put in the cart. It was highlighted and very clear on the laptop that I was selecting the wrong financing option (could not find any such error on the mobile site). Other than this slight flaw, it was a very easy transaction to complete.
